org.apache.struts2.rest

Interface HttpHeaders

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpHeaders

    public interface HttpHeaders
    Type-safe rest-related information to apply to a response

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Applies the configured information to the response
      String getResultCode() 
      int getStatus()

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        String apply(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
           Object target)
        Applies the configured information to the response
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        response - The response
        target - The target object, usually the action
        Returns:
        The result code to process
